codeGet:
SELECT ZSRLOCA_ANUM                                      ANUM,
         SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME || ', ' || SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME   STUDENT_NAME,
         ZSRLOCA_CREATED_BY                                CREATED_BY,
         ZSRLOCA_CREATED_DATE                              CREATED_DATE,
         ZSRLOCA_TERM_CODE                                 TERM_CODE,
         ZSRLOCA_UPDATED_BY                                UPDATED_BY,
         ZSRLOCA_UPDATED_DATE                              UPDATED_DATE,
         ZSRLOCA_ZIP                                       ZIP_CODE,
         ZSRLOCZ_CITY                                      CITY,
         ZSRLOCZ_COUNTY                                    COUNTY,
         ZSRLOCZ_CAMPUS                                    CAMPUS,
         ZSRLOCA_SURROGATE_ID                              "id"
    FROM BANINST1.ZSRLOCA
         LEFT JOIN BANINST1.ZSRLOCZ ON ZSRLOCA_ZIP = ZSRLOCZ_ZIP
         JOIN SPRIDEN
           ON SPRIDEN_ID = ZSRLOCA_ANUM AND SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND IS NULL
   WHERE SPRIDEN_ID = USER
ORDER BY ZSRLOCA_TERM_CODE DESC
   FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
codePost:
DECLARE
  LV_DATE   DATE := SYSDATE;
  LV_USER   VARCHAR2 (60) := USER;
BEGIN

  INSERT INTO BANINST1.ZSRLOCA (ZSRLOCA_ANUM,
                                ZSRLOCA_CREATED_BY,
                                ZSRLOCA_CREATED_DATE,
                                ZSRLOCA_TERM_CODE,
                                ZSRLOCA_UPDATED_BY,
                                ZSRLOCA_UPDATED_DATE,
                                ZSRLOCA_ZIP)
       VALUES (LV_USER,
               LV_USER,
               LV_DATE,
               :TERM_CODE,
               LV_USER,
               LV_DATE,
               :ZIP_CODE);
END;
